subject: Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Arizona named Russ Pennell as the interim replacement for the retired coach Lute Olson. Pennell, 47, is a former assistant to Rob Evans at Arizona State and served last year as a Sun Devils radio analyst. Athletic Director Jim Livengood turned to Pennell, who has never been a college head coach, after Mike Dunlap, Olson’s top assistant, said he wanted to stay as an assistant.
